humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, a single left axillary sentinel lymph node was removed and found to be negative for tumor, confirmed by cytokeratin (AE1/AE3) immunostains. This information aligns with New Rule 11 and New Rule 10, which state that N0 can indicate no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that a single left axillary sentinel lymph node was negative for tumor, confirmed by cytokeratin (AE1/AE3) immunostains. This indicates that there is no evidence of cancer in the lymph nodes, which corresponds to an N0 stage. The substaging information is not provided, so I am ignoring it for this question.
